android.title: Android
steps: First, download PowerTunnel APP (click the download button below).
Then click on the "Copy PowerTunnel" button — it will copy the PowerTunnel host link.
Open the PowerTunnel app, click the three-line icon, and click on the host settings icon.
Paste the copied PowerTunnel host URL. Also, change the host update period from 12 hours to "On Start".
Now you can log in to your GTPS!

ios.title: iOS
steps: Download the app called "Surge 5" from the App Store.
Press "OK".
Click on "Default.conf".
Click on "IMPORT" part — Download Profile from URL.
Paste the URL from your copy when you click the "Copy iOS Host" button above, then click "OK" and "Done".
Press "SETUP" and then agree to the policy by clicking "OK" and "Allow" for VPN Configuration.
Done! Open "Growtopia" and Connect!

windows.title: Windows
steps: Press ⊞ Win+R (Windows Key + R) to open the "Run" window.
Type in C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc in the textbox.
Find the file named "hosts".
Right-click on the "hosts" file and edit it with Notepad or a text editor.
Add the host IP entries (click "Copy Windows Host" below).
Save the file and log on to your Growtopia!

macos.title: macOS
steps: Open Terminal.
Run: sudo nano /etc/hosts
Add the host IP entries (click "Copy macOS Host" below).
Press Ctrl+O to save, then Ctrl+X to exit.
Run: sudo dscacheutil -flushcache
Open Growtopia and connect!
